column6: Many years ago, in the mystical city of Kun' Lun, young Danny Rand stared at a suit behind glass -- the garb of "the Immortal Iron Fist" -- and knew that he was destined to wear it.  But where did this costume come from? Why did it wait for Danny all those years like a shadow of his future?
column8: | penciller (cover):David Aja | writer:Matt Fraction | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth
